divs: sighting detailsthe first sighting was in march not sure of date close to the tenth but was at 503am. i had got up to use the bathroom and looked out the window looking west\sw i saw a bright yellowish colored object in the sky. i went into the kitchen to look out that window, it was still there and i noticed it sparkled and the lights faded in and out. there is a treeline approx 3 miles west of my house just west of st rd 1. this is where it looked like it was. as i watched for about 5 or ten mins the object slowly disappeared. it was on a wednesday. two weeks later on a wed at 504 am i got up same thing, to use the bathroom and saw it again. this time i went outside and stood and looked at it. it appeared to move in an almost straight path toward my house.as it got overhead i saw it had these yellowish light that didnt blink and almost appeared solid yellow. there was no noise. i live very close to a small airport in connersville on the fayette wayne county line. i hear airplanes all the time. there was absolutley no noise. the object passed over my house and just disappeared. afterwards i experienced an extremely bad headache for a few hours. i saw this again over that same treeline in july. it disappeared very quickly and was around 530am on a tuesday morning. unsure of the date but will keep track of the dates much better from now on if i see it again..also the july sighting i woke up my husband to see this too.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Connersville
There were no other sightings in Connersville on or around March 10th 2010
Summary: object appeared just over treeline moved slowly no sound fading lights
